subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The teenager Coco Vandeweghe will join Melanie Oudin, Bethanie Mattek-Sands and the doubles specialist Liezel Huber on the United States team that will face Italy in the Fed Cup final.
snippet: The teenager Coco Vandeweghe will join Melanie Oudin, Bethanie Mattek-Sands and the doubles specialist Liezel Huber on the United States team that will face Italy in the Fed Cup final.
